alert.note: Alert for Amador; Calaveras; El Dorado; Placer; Sacramento; San Joaquin (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 28 at 5:30PM PST by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and northern California, including the following counties, in Placer, Amador, Calaveras, El Dorado, Sacramento and San Joaquin. * WHEN...Until 730 PM PST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 528 PM PST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor roadway flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.2 to 0.5 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Stockton, Roseville, Citrus Heights, Folsom, Rocklin, Auburn, Jackson, Cameron Park, El Dorado Hills, Fair Oaks, Paloma, San Andreas, Lodi, Lincoln, Ione, Loomis, Rancho Murieta, Forest Home, Rancho Seco Park and Latrobe. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Amador; Calaveras; El Dorado; Placer; Sacramento; San Joaquin
